name: Avocado Salsa Verde
description: Avocado Salsa Verde has one of the best flavor-to-effort ratios in all of Mexican cuisine. You'll get incredible flavor from very little effort by using just a few key ingredients.

recipeInstructions.text: Pull the husks off the tomatillos and give them a good rinse.
recipeInstructions.name: Pull the husks off the tomatillos and give them a good rinse.

recipeInstructions.text: Cut the stems out of the tomatillos if you want.
recipeInstructions.name: Cut the stems out of the tomatillos if you want.

recipeInstructions.text: Roast the tomatillos in the oven for 10-15 minutes or until they start to turn army green
recipeInstructions.name: Roast the tomatillos in the oven for 10-15 minutes or until they start to turn army green

recipeInstructions.text: Add tomatillos to a blender or food processor along with ½ onion, 1 garlic clove, 10-12 sprigs cilantro, and ½ of the jalapeno
recipeInstructions.name: Add tomatillos to a blender or food processor along with ½ onion, 1 garlic clove, 10-12 sprigs cilantro, and ½ of the jalapeno

recipeInstructions.text: Pulse blend and taste for heat level
recipeInstructions.name: Pulse blend and taste for heat level

recipeInstructions.text: If you want more spice add more jalapeno (either ¼ or ½ more)
recipeInstructions.name: If you want more spice add more jalapeno (either ¼ or ½ more)

recipeInstructions.text: Once happy with the heat level, add the avocado to the blender and combine well
recipeInstructions.name: Once happy with the heat level, add the avocado to the blender and combine well
